mapper.select: SELECT u.name AS userName, u.user_no AS userNo, c.date AS date, c.mem_cnt AS memCnt, m.place_no AS placeNo, c.req_no AS reqNo FROM user u, customer_req c, customer_req_match m WHERE u.user_no = c.user_no AND c.req_no = m.req_no AND m.place_no = #{ placeNo } ORDER BY c.date

SELECT sug_no AS sugNo, u.name AS userName, s.resv_date AS date, cr.mem_cnt AS memCnt, s.memo AS memo FROM customer_req AS cr JOIN user AS u ON cr.user_no = u.user_no JOIN suggestion AS s ON cr.req_no = s.req_no WHERE isresv = 'Y' AND place_no = #{placeNo};
SELECT place_name FROM place WHERE place_no = #{placeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO suggestion (req_no, place_no, user_no, resv_date, message, memo) VALUES (#{req_no}, #{place_no}, #{user_no}, #{resv_date}, #{message}, #{message})
mapper.select: SELECT gender, count(gender) AS cnt, round(avg(star),1) AS avg FROM VIEW_guestAnalysis__project_db__review__user WHERE place_no = #{placeNo} GROUP BY gender

SELECT concat("\"",v.newAge,'s',"\"") AS newAge, count(v.newAge) AS cnt, round(avg(star),1) AS avg FROM (select left(age,1)*10 as 'newAge', star from VIEW_guestAnalysis__project_db__review__user WHERE place_no = #{placeNo}) v GROUP BY v.newAge
SELECT star, count(star) AS cnt FROM VIEW_guestAnalysis__project_db__review__user WHERE place_no = #{placeNo} and gender in (#{gender1}, #{gender2}) GROUP BY star ORDER BY star
mapper.update: UPDATE suggestion SET memo = #{memo} WHERE sug_no = #{sugNo};
